type: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Insurance Term Plan

Life Shield Plus.notes: ADB sum assured includes Life-Stage Upgrade proportion

Life Shield ROP.maturity_benefit: Total Premiums Paid (if surviving till maturity)
Life Shield ROP.notes: SISO discounts apply for monthly mode

sum_assured.max: No explicit cap; subject to BAUP

discounts.loyalty_rebate: 1% of premium through PPT for existing customers (policy matured or in-force for >= 3 months)
discounts.salary_rebate: 5% of first-year premium for salaried employees
discounts.first_time_buyer_discount: Insurance for All Discount: 5% on first-year premium
discounts.siso: 6% discount for monthly mode under Life Shield ROP (if opted)
discounts.note: If SISO is opted then Online/Direct/Web aggregator discount not applicable for ROP

death.no_prior_ti_claim: Sum Assured on Death to nominee
death.prior_ti_claim: Prevailing Sum Assured on Death = Sum Assured on Death - Sum Assured on TI
death.policy_termination: Payment of Death Benefit terminates policy
death.sum_assured_on_death_definition: Higher of (10 x Annualized Premium) or Sum Assured (incl. life-stage upgrades); minimum 105% of Total Premiums Paid

terminal_illness.definition: Condition likely to lead to death within 6 months as certified by Medical Practitioner
terminal_illness.payment: Sum Assured on TI (acceleration of Death Benefit)
terminal_illness.special_case_sum_assured_gt_2cr: If sum assured > 2 cr, company pays 2 cr and policy continues for remaining SA with waiver of future premiums

adb.description: Available only under Life Shield Plus; additional benefit equal to ADB sum assured in case of accidental death; paid as lump sum

wop_atpd_ti.description: Waiver of future premiums upon ATPD or TI depending on conditions; policy continues for existing benefits

maturity_rop.for_rop: Total Premiums Paid if LA survives to maturity
maturity_rop.if_ti_paid_prior: [1 - (Sum Assured on TI / Sum Assured on Death)] x Total Premiums Paid

other_rules.underwriting: Underwriting as per BAUP at time of upgrade

premium_holiday.first_ph_eligibility: After 5 policy years and policy in-force with premiums paid
premium_holiday.next_ph_gap: Next premium holiday only after 5 policy years after previous PH year
premium_holiday.premiums_during_ph: Not included in Total Premiums Paid
premium_holiday.if_not_exercised: Company will waive last 1/2/3 policy year premiums depending on unutilized PH count

auto_cover_continuance.description: Defer premiums up to 12 months while maintaining cover; no additional premium
auto_cover_continuance.eligibility: At least 3 policy years complete, all due premiums paid, policy in-force
auto_cover_continuance.multiple_times_allowed_with_gap: Yes, with at least 5 policy years between instances

life_shield_plus_life_shield.termination_value_limited_pay: Termination factor x Total Premiums Paid (no Termination Value during PPT). Termination factors not guaranteed.

life_shield_rop.surrender_value_availability: Only if 1 full year premiums paid
life_shield_rop.ssv: Special Surrender Value after completion of 1 full year
life_shield_rop.gsv: Guaranteed Surrender Value after completion of 2 full years
life_shield_rop.surrender_value: Higher of GSV (GSV factor x Total Premiums Paid) or SSV; not to exceed 100% of Total Premiums Paid
life_shield_rop.paid_up_rules: If 1 full year paid and later premiums not paid → converted to paid-up; paid-up sums proportionate to premiums paid; no paid-up for WOP

revival.window: Within 5 years from due date of first unpaid premium but before end of policy term
requirements: All due premiums + revival interest + applicable taxes
revival.revival_interest_formula: [10-year G-Sec yield + 2%] rounded up (benchmark basis), reviewed annually

suicide_exclusion.within_12_months: Nominee receives higher of 80% of Total Premiums Paid or Surrender/Termination Value (if policy in-force)

list: Death/disability due to commission of criminal act with criminal intent
Under influence of alcohol/drugs (other than prescribed)
Participation in naval/military/air force operations (peace time)
Aviation incidents other than fare-paying passenger on scheduled airlines
War, invasion, civil war, rebellion, riots

atpd_definition.basis: Loss of both eyes; loss of both arms and both hands; loss of one arm & one leg; loss of both legs; loss definitions for amputation vs non-amputation (motor power grades) and 6-month documentation requirement; certified by registered company-appointed medical practitioner

loan.available_for: Life Shield ROP variant (if policy has surrender value)
loan.loan_interest: As decided by company; currently linked to G-Sec + 2% (applied annually)
loan.deduction_on_claim: Outstanding loan + interest will be deducted from benefits payable
loan.foreclosure_conditions: If outstanding loan + interest > surrender value → notice + 30-day cure → foreclosure if not paid

riders.name: Bajaj Allianz Life Family Protect Rider
Bajaj Allianz Life New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

scenarios.terminal_illness_at_50: 1 crore terminal illness benefit; policy terminates
scenarios.atpd_at_50: future premiums waived; cover continues till 85

scenarios.accidental_death_at_50: 2 crore total (1C base + 1C ADB); policy terminates

scenarios.survive_to_maturity: Total premiums paid returned (30,52,760); policy terminates
scenarios.atpd_at_55: future premiums waived; cover continues; maturity benefit payable if survived to maturity

definitions.annualized_premium: premium payable in a year excluding taxes, rider premiums, underwriting extra premium and modal loadings
definitions.total_premiums_paid: sum of all premiums paid under base policy excluding extra premiums and taxes
definitions.medical_practitioner: registered doctor with valid registration; not the policyholder; not employed by insurer; not related to policyholder

statutory_info.prohibition_of_rebate_section_41: No person shall offer rebate of commission or premium except per published prospectuses or tables; penalty up to 10 lakh rupees.
statutory_info.fraud_misstatement_section_45: Fraud & misstatement dealt as per section 45
